story:
This is the summary of my world trip which I traveled 4 continents, 20 countries, 82 cities in 6.5 months by taking 26 flights, countless bus, train, car, ferry and motorcycle trips after taking a one way flight to India with my backpack without any proper plan on 2nd February 2015.

For more detailed pictures and stories you can also check my Instagram account.

To move between days and places, use the left/right arrow keys on your keyboard or on the screen. You can directly access countries by clicking the name of the country at the bottom of the screen.

If you have any questions, you can reach me via simsekaltug@gmail.com

Enjoy your trip.
story_tr:
2 şubat 2015 tarihinde sadece bir sırt çantası ve Hindistan’a tek yön bir bilet alarak başladığım ve 6.5 ayda, 4 kıta, 20 ülke, 82 şehir gezdiğim; 26 uçak yolculuğu, sayısız otobüs, tren, araba, gemi ve motosiklet yolculukları yaptığım 200 günlük dünya turumun haritasını ve maceralarımın bir kısmını bu sitede bulabilirsiniz.

Daha detaylı fotoğraflar ve hikayeler için Instagram hesabıma göz atabilirsiniz.

Seyahatimdeki günleri ilerletmek ve rotamı görebilmek için klavyenizin sağ/sol ok tuşlarını veya ekrandaki ok tuşlarını kullanabilirsiniz. Bulunduğum ülkelere direkt ulaşabilmek için ise ekranın altındaki ülke isimlerine tıklayabilirsiniz.

Seyahate başlamadan önce Altuğ Şimşek kimdir derseniz buraya, gezi öncesindeki hazırlıklarımı öğrenmek için buraya tıklayabilirsiniz.

Bunlara ek olarak seyahat sonrası yorumlarım veya başka sorularınız için simsekaltug@gmail.com adresinden benimle iletişime geçebilirsiniz.

Keyifli yolculuklar.

story:
Time to go to Fraser Island, largest sand island in the world!
Having the best time of Australia for 3 days!⛺️ Camping with 64 crazy people, driving 4x4 jeeps in the beaches and rain forests, cooking your own food all the time, seeing the best sky ever, and partying with 1 truck of booze! (p.s: my team is on the right) #worldtrip
#Australia #Fraser #Island #camp #trip #sand #ocean #shipwreck #4WD #jeep
story_tr:

story:
Sickest festival I've ever seen💥
Songkran Festival is the celebration of New Year in Thailand and biggest water fight in the world💧 Along 3 days, people are partying and doing water fights in the streets, beaches, and festival areas during all day and night. This is one of the party places with DJ performance and firemen were spraying water to crowd with their high-pressure hoses all night🚿
It was such a great experience to celebrate Songkran with thousands of Thai people in Pattaya!
#Thailand #Pattaya #Songkran #festival #new #year #water #fight

story:
Dancing Elephant Hostel is ready for the Full Moon Party
Craziest 5 days of my life in Koh Phangan! Staying 40 people in one dorm made us a real family with great people. Too many buckets, stories, blackouts but every night was so much fun and full of unforgettable memories! #worldtrip
#Thailand #Koh #Phangan #Island #Fullmoon #party #dancing #elephant #hostel
story_tr:
Dancing Elephant Hosteli dünyanın en büyük plaj partisi olan Full Moon Parti için hazır
40 kişi ile beraber aynı yatakhanede kalma tecrübesini yaşadım ve onlarla gerçek bir aile gibi olarak hayatımın en çılgın 5 gününü geçirdim. Her gecenin büyük bir kısmı kayıp olsa da hepsi birbirinden çılgın ve unutulmaz anılarla doluydu!
//Dancing Elephant Hostel is ready for the Full Moon Party
Craziest 5 days of my life in Koh Phangan! Staying 40 people in one dorm made us a real family with great people. Too many buckets, stories, blackouts but every night was so much fun and full of unforgettable memories! #worldtrip

story:
Winning $150 beerpong tournament in a penguin costume! Never ending crazy nights in Thailand
Me and my full moon buddy @behben, which we met in Dancing Elephant hostel in Koh Phangan and traveled together to Koh Samui, attended a big beerpong tournament in Koh Samui Island. We've made it to final and we've decided to wear penguin costumes for final match to make it more fun. And all our beerpong experiences in Turkey and Germany took the stage and we won $150!
This money is coming from Karma because I dropped my phone to sea at Full Moon Party and some amount of my new phone will be paid with this money
Our team ''Dancing Elephant'' is champion for bucket crew, miss you all❤️ #worldtrip
#Thailand #Koh #Samui #Island #beerpong #tournament #champion #penguin #costume #epic #win #seyahat #wanderlust #worldtour
story_tr:
Thailand'ın Koh Samui adasında katıldığım beerpong turnvasından kazandığım $150 ile zafer pozumuz
Oynadığım bu kadar beerpong'un karşılığını dünyanın öbür ucunda olsa da aldım

story:
What happens in Thailand stays in Thailand, and now it's time to say goodbye from where I started my crazy 1 month trip here🔞🙉🙈🙊
I was planning to stay here 2 weeks, but it treated me so well, so I kept staying until the end of my permitted stay, and trying to leave country at my last day! I had so many crazy memories with amazing people which I will meet them again in so many other countries. Thailand, you will always be remembered! ❤️
My plans has changed again and I've decided to see 3 of last 5 communist countries in the world before they vanish.
I've heard amazing stories about Laos from other travellers, so I'm ready for the next adventures in Laos!🔜 #Thailand #Bangkok #Golden #Mountain #temple #3monkeys #farewell #goodbye

story:
One of the experiences I will never forget about Vietnam👨‍👨‍👧‍👧
I spent one night with these Hmong hill tribe children in the mountain. When I juggle tennis balls they were going crazy, 6 of them were sitting on my nap, hugging me and singing songs which wasn't even Vietnamese language. I've witnessed Hmong's different life style and i've heard too many weird stories about Hmong tribes that night. But the thing i will not forget is the innocence of these children with barely any future...
story_tr:
Vietnam'da hiç unutamayacağım gecelerden biri‍‍‍
Sa Pa'daki gecemi Hmong kabilesinden bir ailenin evinde bu çocuklarla beraber geçirdim. Tenis toplarımla jonglörlük yapmaya başladığımda muhtemelen ilk defa tenis topu gördükleri için şaşkına dönüp, 6 sı birden kucağıma atlayarak Vietnamca bile olmayan dillerinde bağıra bağıra şarkı söylüyorlardı. Onlarla geçirdiğim 2 gün boyunca Hmong kabilesinin değişik yaşam tarzına tanık olup çok ilginç hikayeler dinledim. Fakat bu tecrübemde unutamayacağım tek şey bu masum çocukların bırakın ülkeden ayrılmayı en yakın şehirden bile çıkmaya hakları olmayıp hayatlarının sonuna kadar pirinç tarlalarını sürerek bu dağda yaşayacak olmalarıydı.. Böyle şeyleri gördükten sonra hayat insana çok daha gerçekçi geliyor 
#Vietnam #SaPa #village #Hmong #tribe #homestay #experience #children #smile #gopro #exploremore #seyahat #worldtrip

story:
Let me introduce my new baby✌
This is Dark Night, (Turkish name is Kara Şimşek), and he is gonna be my new home for the next month in Vietnam!
One more dream is coming true, I will cross all Vietnam from north to south with this motorbike and make more than 2500km (which means crossing my country 4 times from north to south)!
I bought it for $160 (literraly) after a good negotiation, and I will sell it at the end of my journey in Ho Chi Minh City hopefully for a better price and make some money too
Are you ready for my biggest adventure?⛔️
#Vietnam #motorbike #Darknight #HanoitoHoChiMinh #biggest #adventure

Day-3 on road: We couldn't make it to planned city because of some unfortunate situations and it got dark.
We were knocking every door to sleep in the middle of nowhere and finally we've found a place to sleep and ended up with these Vietnamies guys 🙏 Even though their little English, it was one of the best nights in Vietnam. They gave us free food, free beer and free rice wine all the night. We had so much fun with them, they even gave us some food for tomorrow's lunch, and they woke up at 5 am with us, brought us to a restaurant and bought our breakfasts!🍺🍲🍒🍳
It looks like this journey is gonna be way more crazier than we thought!💥 #worldtrip
#Vietnam #localnight #HoChiMinTrail #motorbike #roadtrip #adventure #worldtravel #wanderlust #worldtour

story:
NEXT STOP: Cambodia, Phnom Penh!
Visiting Genocide Museum and Killing Fields in the capital of Cambodia to learn what happened under Pol Pot's extremely paranoid regime.
Between 1975 and 1979, he killed 3 million of his own Cambodian people out of 8 million population.
He killed all educated people, people who know reading and writing, and even people who wear glasses to do his communist revolution and build his 'Democratic Kampuchea'. It was a shocking experience to see what happened there and how many years this country went back. I suggest everyone to read and learn about Cambodia's past and understand these kind of things are still possible even in this age.
#Cambodia #PhnomPenh #independence

'A wiseman climbs Mount Fuji once in his life, only a fool climbs it twice'🗻
It is a well-known saying in Japan; I tested it and I couldn't agree more! I've made it to top of the Fujisan, most climbed mountain in the world, and it was one of the most difficult things I've done so far! I started to climb at 20:30 and I reached to the top just before the sunrise around at 4:30🌄
I met some guys on the road and made the climb together; probably I couldn't have made it without them🙏
We took the wrong road and climbed 1km more than other people because there was no clear signs and no lights on the road, just our head lights. And last one hour of climbing was so cold that I was wearing 7 pieces of clothes on me!
But when I see the sun over clouds at the highest point in Japan, it worths for all of the struggle⛅️
I'm happy that I had such a big experience; but I don't recommend anyone to climb in that kind of a bad weather without enough climbing experience🔞
#Japan #Mount #Fuji #Fujisan #mountain #climbing

This is the busiest park in Shanghai and it was full of people who are sitting in front of their umbrellas🌂
I was curious about what's going on here and luckily staying with 2 Chinese guys so they explained me one of the weirdest and funny situations I see in China.
This is a matchmaking market👫
There are papers on umbrellas which only says the person's age, job, annual salary and sometimes special demands like 'want to buy a house and share the expenses half half' or etc.📝 These old guys and women are not looking spouse for themselves, they are looking for young relatives, sons, or doughters, or the people they agreed for money. There were hard barganings going on about who is gonna get the girl or guy, and what will be the conditions. There are even wholesalers which have banners with 100 numbers, so people can come and choose a wife or husband for themselves easily🐏
Billions of people are living in China, so I've realized everything can happen here👀 #worldtrip
#China #Shanghai #People's #Square #matchmaking #marriage #market

Çöpçatanlık Pazarı👫
Şemsiyelerin üzerindeki kağıtlarda sadece kişinin yaşı, mesleği, yıllık maaşı ve varsa 'ev alıp masrafını yarı yarıya paylaşmak istiyorum' gibi istekleri yazıyordu📝 Komik olanı ise bütün gün orada oturarak bu yaşlı insanlar kendilerine değil; akrabalarına, çocuklarına ya da para karşılığında anlaştığı kişilere eş arıyordu. Kızı veya oğlanı kimin alacağına dair veya anlaşma şartlarının ne olacağına dair çok sıkı pazarlıklar ve tartışmalar izledim. Hatta toptancı satıcılar bile vardı, büyük bannerlara 1'den 100'e kadar insanları numaralandırmışlar, eş arayanlara geniş bir yelpaze sunuyorlardı 🐏
Böylece trilyonlarca kişinin yaşadığı Çin'de her şeyin mümkün olduğunu fark ettim👀

Hasta la Victoria Siempre!🎋
Until Victory, Always!
Visiting Che Guevera Museum in Santa Clara and learning a lot about Cuban Revolution📖🔫
Che Guevera ends one of his letters to Fidel Castro with this words and it became the most famous slogan of Cuban Revolution. And you can find this slogan on most of the walls and billboards in Cuba📻
#Cuba #SantaClara #CheGuevera #Museum #HastaLaVictoriaSiempre
story_tr:
Hasta la Victoria Siempre!🎋
Until Victory, Always!
Visiting Che Guevera Museum in Santa Clara and learning a lot about Cuban Revolution📖🔫
Che Guevera ends one of his letters to Fidel Castro with this words and it became the most famous slogan of Cuban Revolution. And you can find this slogan on most of the walls and billboards in Cuba📻
//Zafere kadar, daima!🎋
Santa Clara şehrinde Che Guevera Müzesi'ni ziyaret edip Küba devrimi hakkında bir çok ilginç bilgi öğrendik📖🔫
Bu söz de Che'nin Fidel Castro'ya yazdığı bir mektubun son sözleri olup Küba Devrimi'nin en meşhur sloganı haline gelmiş. Küba'daki bir çok duvarda ve billboardda bu sözleri ve devrimle ilgili yazıları görebilirsiniz📻
#Cuba #SantaClara #CheGuevera #Museum #HastaLaVictoriaSiempre

story:
6,5 months around the world past so fast with numerous crazy stories, and now its end of my world trip and time to go back home...✈️✈️
This is one of my last flights, but I still couldn't understand that my trip is over. I was shocked when I took my last flight after 200 days around the world✈️ I spent long time in this flight and I had time to think all of the stories I had during this trip. Just amazing memories... Then I realize that show must go on... There was one song that I was listening in the plane:
I'm coming home, I'm coming home, tell the world that I'm coming home...
story_tr:
6,5 aylık seyahatimin son günü ve son uçaklarından biri✈️
Uçağa bindiğimde çok karmaşık duygular içerisindeydim, daha çok şok olmuştum. Çok hızlı seyahat ettiğimden dolayı seyahatimi değerlendirmeye ve Türkiye'ye döndüğümde neler olacağını düşünmeye pek fırsatım olmamıştı. Bu son 24 saatlik zaman zarfında dünyanın değişik yerlerinde geçirdiğim 200 günü tekrar gözden geçirmeye vaktim oldu ve her ülkede geçirdiğim zamanı ayrı ayrı özleyip ne kadar eşsiz anılara sahip olduğumu farkettim.
Bu 6,5 ayın hiçbir gününden pişmanlık duymadım, tek düşündüğüm şey keşke daha fazla vaktim olsaydı da bir 6 ay daha devam edebilseydim, daha dünyada görülecek çok yer var...
Ama hayat devam ediyor ve yeni işim beni bekliyor. Çok özlediğim ailemi ve arkadaşlarımı görmek için sabırsızlanıyorum!✈️✈️
